Package arraylist_pkg

Class Post

java.lang.Object
arraylist_pkg.Post
public class Post extends Object
This class represents a post on a social media platform. A post has an ID number, an account ID of the user who created it, contents, a number of likes, and a number of comments. Users can like and comment on posts.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new Post object with the given ID number, account ID, and contents.

      accountId - The account ID of the user who created this post.
      contents - The contents of this post.

    • liking_process

      public void liking_process​(int interactionId, int accountIdd, Account account_)
      Adds a new like to this post with the given interaction ID, account ID, and Account object. interactionId is given manually because static is forbidden
      Parameters:
      interactionId - The ID number of this like interaction.
      accountIdd - The account ID of the user who liked this post.
      account_ - The Account object representing the user who liked this post.

    • unliking_process

      public void unliking_process​(Account account_)
      Unlike to this post with the given account.
      Parameters:
      account_ - The account ID of the user who liked this post.

    • commenting_process

      public void commenting_process​(int interactionId, int accountIdd, Account account_, String content_)
      Adds a comment to the post with the given interaction ID, using the specified account and content. Increments the comment number for this post.
      Parameters:
      interactionId - the ID of the post to add the comment to
      accountIdd - the ID of the account that made the comment
      account_ - the Account object representing the account that made the comment
      content_ - the content of the comment

    • uncommenting_process

      public void uncommenting_process​(Account account_, int which_comment)
      Delete a comment in the post Decrements the comment number for this post.
      Parameters:
      account_ - the account that made the uncomment process.
      which_comment - Information on which comment will be deleted
